title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.60 - Designation of a facility for the questioning of children in custody (PINS)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.60 - Designation of a facility for the questioning of children in custody (PINS)

State Regulations

Designation of facilities for the questioning
of children pursuant to section
724
(b)(ii)
of the Family Court Act shall be in
accordance with section
205.20
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
205.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
